title: An Interview with Colin Bannister

abstract: 'Over four years, we get to know each other pretty well. A great bond of friendship.'
description: In 1950, Colin Bannister sailed from Syndey to Singapore to defend the Malayan Government against an uprising in what was called 'The Malayan Emergency'. Bannister's time in Malaya has taught him about power and the important things in life.
